coreAtributes.name: Breastplate
coreAtributes.description: An armoured plate that protects the upper torso, shoulders,and upper arms. Excellent at protecting the wearer from physical harm, and it's enchanted to accommodate wings.

displacementText.playerSelf: You undo the straps for your Breastplate, removing the armour.
displacementText.playerNPC: You undo the straps for [npc.name]'s Breastplate.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You violently yank at the straps holding [npc.name]'s Breastplate on, removing the armour.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] undoes the straps for their Breastplate, removing the armour.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] undoes the straps for your Breastplate, removing the armour.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] violently yanks at the straps holding your Breastplate on, removing the armour.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] undoes the straps for [npc2.name]'s Breastplate, removing the armour.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] violently yanks on the straps holding [npc2.name]'s Breastplate on, removing the armour.

replacementText.playerSelf: You don your Breastplate, securing it with straps.
replacementText.playerNPC: You assist [npc.name] in donning their Breastplate.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hastily, and roughly, assist [npc.name] in donning their Breastplate.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] dons their Breastplate, securing it with straps.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] assists you in donning your Breastplate.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] hastily, and roughly, assists you in donning your Breastplate.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] hastily, and roughly, assists [npc2.name] in donning their Breastplate.
